Unfortunately Androids widget API is not designed for frequent updates! These can cause battery drainage and anything from lags till total freezing of your launcher application. However Countdown Timer Widget is designed to use as little battery as possible. When no timer is activated or the screen is turned off Countdown Timer Widget will use no CPU and no battery. The alarms will be triggered anyway! If you experience lags or find that your battery drainage has increased significantly using this widget increase the refresh interval to an acceptable amount.

This is a widget and no app, so just add the widget to your homescreen in the usual manner. To change the settings later, just press the menu button while creating a new timer.
 If your screen lags/freezes please read the "Important Battery Notice"!
